name: NAR - Not Another Royale
description:
"NAR - Not Another Royale" is an online shooter with different game modes.
In addition to the "Battle Royale" mode in which up to 100 players fight each other until only one is alive, there are also game modes like

  • Team Deathmatch | Deathmatch
  • Capture the Flag | Search and Destroy

Some Features:
- Smooth character control
- Extended weapon system (different settings: recoil, spreading, etc.)
- Different weapon extensions (silencer, red dot, rifle scope, etc.)
- Inventory and equipment system
- Many different weapons / headgear / vests



Visit the Homepage or Facebook-Page of NAR to learn more about the development
